channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US Job Openings Fall to the Lowest in 10 Months
Kawhi Leonard reportedly paid $28 million for 'no-show job' with Clippers as way to get around NBA salary cap

Putin tells Ukraine: End war via talks or I will end it by force
Canadian PM says he will take part in bid to resolve China canola dispute
Photos show wildfire burning through historic California Gold Rush town
item.description: A wildfire known as the 6-5 Fire​ has scorched homes in a historic California Gold Rush town that was settled around 1850 by Chinese miners.

item.title: WATCH: Wedding crasher steals $60,000 in gifts to bride and groom
item.description: Police are searching for a wedding crasher who stole about $60,000 in cash and checks intended for a Southern California bride and groom.

item.title: Amazon says it's ending the Prime Invitee program. Here are the details.
item.description: Amazon wants users who don't live with a Prime account holder to sign up for their own memberships.

item.title: 'This is not a hoax': Epstein survivors speak out demanding files be released
item.description: Several Jeffrey Epstein survivors made a direct appeal to President Trump to take action as they demanded all the files be released.
